metadata.title: CVE-2020-7237 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Cacti 1.2.8 allows Remote Code Execution (by privileged users) via shellmetacharacters in the Performance Boost Debug Log field ofpoller_automation.php. OS commands are executed when a new poller cyclebegins. The attacker must be authenticated, and must have access to modifythe Performance Settings of the product.

criterions.comment: cacti package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
